alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Fremont County through 715 PM MDT... At 644 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morton, which is also near Pavillion. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rain, wind gusts to 30 mph, and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rainfall may quickly reach 0.25 inches with higher totals of 0.50 inches possible, leading to ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... These storms have developed in a line from north of Pavillion to near Morton to around Ethete. These communities and nearby areas are the most likely to be impacted by the heavy rain and small hail. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Move inside a building.
